name: isosorbide
source: Bergstrom C. A. S.; Norinder U.; Luthman K.; Artursson P. Molecular Descriptors Influencing Melting Point and Their Role in Classification of Solid Drugs. J. Chem. Inf. Comput. Sci.; (Article); 2003; 43(4); 1177-1398
Reason: 1,2-propanediol base has a melting point around 50 degrees Celsius. The methoxy group introduces additional rigidity and molecular weight, estimated at +5 degrees Celsius. The isopropyl group introduces additional rigidity and molecular weight, estimated at +5 degrees Celsius. The carbamate group introduces additional rigidity and hydrogen bonding, estimated at +10 degrees Celsius. The ether linkage introduces additional rigidity and molecular weight, estimated at +2 degrees Celsius. The dioxane-like bridging moiety introduces additional rigidity and molecular weight, estimated at +5 degrees Celsius.
